pkgmetadata.longdescription: User-Friendly Interface for Review of Scientific Literature // Contains the development of a tool that provides a web-based graphical user interface (GUI) to perform a review of the scientific literature under the Bayesian approach of Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA)and machine learning algorithms. The application methodology is framed by the well known procedures in topic modelling on how to clean and process data. Contains methods described by Blei, David M., Andrew Y. Ng, and Michael I. Jordan (2003) https://jmlr.org/papers/volume3/blei03a/blei03a.pdf Allocation"; Thomas L. Griffiths and Mark Steyvers (2004) doi:10.1073/pnas.0307752101 ; Xiong Hui, et al (2019) doi:10.1016/j.cie.2019.06.010.
